title: GIFEC Events
author: unknown
text: The 17th edition of the "GIFEC Meetings" will be held on 22 May in Marseille at the Palais du Pharo. The Gifec thus reaffirms its commitment to remain a necessary and privileged place of exchange for the profession. This event will bring together (by invitation) from 5:00 pm in this prestigious setting all distributors of products and industrial solutions as well as all manufacturers members of the GIFEC. Renowned speakers, including Asma Mhalla and Mazarine Marie Mitterrand Pingeot, will host the event on the theme: “What will be the impact of AI in our companies and on the future of our organizations?”  The evening will end with a convivial and gourmet cocktail dinner.   You will find all the useful information on this page: https://www.gifec.org/en/meetings-2025
